short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple, minimal, and trustworthy search engine switcher.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ever find yourself searching for the same thing across multiple search engines or sites? SearchSwap eliminates all of the typing and copy/pasting involved and does it for you with just a couple clicks. It's also completely open source and never does anything with or send your data anywhere.
